text: == Events == * Establishment of the Carmelite Order * Hogen Rebellion in Japan * January 20 – According to legend, freeholder Lalli slays English crusader Bishop Henry with an axe on the ice of the lake Köyliönjärvi in Finland. * The Privilegium Minus elevates Austria to the status of a duchy ruled by the Babenburgs family. (see History of Austria). * Mosan artists create the Stavelot Triptych, a masterpiece of goldsmithing, as a reliquary to house purported pieces of the True Cross.
